alert.note: Alert for Clark; Edgar (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:40AM CDT until June 29 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Northeastern Clark County in east central Illinois... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 739 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Redmon, or 11 miles west of Paris, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Vermilion, Oliver and Dennison. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 144 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
